message.body: Nora's staying overnight, not sure if they'll release her tomorrow, skull fractures so might have to operate. I'll keep ya posted, and thx again for contacting me.
Thanks for contacting me. I am in Ithaca until sunday. I' ll call you when I am back. Let me know if you need anything
Yupyup. She's at my place sleeping now so we'll keep an eye on her
